data.description: twiddles baton while-u-wait for long subrout
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Like Term::ProgressBar, Term::Twiddle is purely for watching
    something while something else happens. Term::Twiddle provides a
    configurable baton (like FreeBSD's boot loader) to watch. You can
    change the baton into just about anything you can animate with ascii
    characters in a sequence (e.g., an arrow, bouncing ball, blinking
    eyes, etc.). There isn't anything else in the Term (or in CPAN
    afaik) that does this.
